item.title: CSS Tips🎄
item.description: 1、居中div .parent { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .parent { display: grid; place-content: center; } .parent{ position:reletive; } .son{ position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); } 2、清除浮动 清除浮动是为了解决浮动元素对后面元素布局的影响，即浮动
